name: Splunk
description: Integrate with Splunk to search, list, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Search
tools.description: Create and run a Splunk search job. Provide an SPL query and optional time range. Returns the search job ID for result retrieval.

tools.name: List Saved Searches
tools.description: List saved searches in Splunk. Returns search names, schedules, and next run times.

tools.name: Get Search Results
tools.description: Retrieve results of a completed Splunk search job by its SID. Returns result rows with field values.

tools.name: List Indexes
tools.description: List Splunk indexes. Returns index names, sizes, event counts, and data models.

tools.name: Create Alert
tools.description: Create a new Splunk saved search configured as an alert. Specify the search query, schedule, and alert conditions.

instanceUrl.label: Splunk Instance URL
instanceUrl.description: Your Splunk instance management URL (including port)
